info.title: Interapp API
info.description: This is the specification for all routes defined in the `api/routes/endpoints/*` directory. All routes should be prefixed with `/api/*`. This spec is not yet fully compliant with openapi >=3.0.0 (DELETE should not have a response body in the newest version).

tags.name: announcement
tags.description: Operations related to announcements by interact's leaders

post.summary: Sign a user up for the application

delete.summary: Sign the user out by invalidating tokens

get.summary: get all user's info, or a specific user's info

404.description: user not found or users not found

patch.summary: change email of requested user (need admin), or user who sent the request

post.summary: Set a reset password email to the user's email if it exists

patch.summary: Reset password given token sent in email

post.summary: Send a verification email to the user

get.summary: Get user permissions, or everyone's permissions

patch.summary: Update self service hours or others' service hours

get.summary: Get all completions for a specific announcement

parameters.name: announcement_id
parameters.description: ID of the announcement to get completions for

patch.summary: Modify the viewed status of an announcement for a user

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: ID of the service to return

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: ID of the service to get users for

get.summary: Get some or all service sessions by service id (optional)
Get the info of service session wrt to a specific user

post.summary: Create new session users in bulk

get.description: get active service sessions hash and info
get active service sessions hash and info

post.description: verify hash to mark current user as attended
